entry.title: Iktisad/youtube_ad_hush: A lightweight Chromium-based browser extension that blocks ads on YouTube. This extension removes video ads, overlay ads, and banner ads, providing a seamless video-watching experience. It is compatible with Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge.

entry.title: john310897/export-json-to-csv: `export-json-to-csv` is a lightweight, high-performance npm package for converting JSON to CSV. It supports nested JSON structures, customizable headers, and handles large datasets efficiently‚Äîideal for seamless data export and interchange.
